contentfulSermon.title: Acts : Chapter 18 - What Happens in Corinth Stays in Corinth

fields.notesFormatted:
Thessalonica

Acts 18

  1. Recognize when people are not open to God's truth.

    Acts 18:1-6

  2. Don't be afraid - speak out.

    Acts 18:7-11

    1 Corinthians 1:1

  3. Don't count out anyone.

    Acts 18:12-17

    Numbers 6

  4. Use God's Word to powerfully share the truth.

    Acts 18:18-28

    2 Timothy 3:16

    James 2:19

    Ephesians 2:8-10
